divs: sighting detailsi took my dog out to pee and happened to look up because the sun felt very warm on my arm. i was watching the cloud formations move and noticed a silvery\black shaped octagon moving at a steady pace from sw to n. the object appeared to be fairly low in the sky. i watched until it disappeared out of my view. i first thought it might be a balloon, but then saw another object moving the same path and speed. i watched for a couple of seconds and then ran in the house to get my phone\camera. by the time i came back outside it was gone. the objects both appeared to have sides that were black and shiny silver. they appeared to be rolling around in a controlled manner as they moved. there wasn't much wind at the time and the thought occurred to me that these objects were moving at a pretty good clip.
Summary: 2 Octagon Shape Objects Flew Over My House 1 After The Other
